brief_description: "Samman Pension" is a social welfare scheme that provides a monthly pension to all the first generation living legal heirs of a freedom fighter of the state.
detailed_description: "Samman Pension" is a social welfare scheme implemented by the Home Department, Government of Uttarakhand. Under this scheme, a monthly pension is provided to all the first-generation living legal heirs of a freedom fighter of the state.
benefits: Note: The said pension shall commence only after the death of the widow/ widower of the deceased freedom fighter and all surviving first generation legal heirs of the deceased freedom fighter, including his sons and daughters, whether married or unmarried, as well as the widow of the first generation heir, are entitled to receive the pension.
eligibility_criteria: Applicant should be permanent resident of Uttarakhand. Applicant should be a first-generation living legal heir of a deceased freedom fighter.

steps: Step 1: The applicant needs to collect the prescribed application form from the office of the District Magistrate. Step 2: Attach all the mandatory documents (Self-attested, if required) along with the application form. Step 3: Submit the application at the office of the District Magistrate.

documents_required: Application form. Any other documents as required.
